text:
Our NHS Test & Trace programme will help us tackle coronavirus.

If you get symptoms - isolate & get a test.

If you are contacted by NHS Test & Trace - follow the instructions.

Do it for your loved ones, your community, and the NHS https://t.co/XhJXgI4qoD

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus

entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.
